item.title: Hack the Box - Traceback
item.description: Intro. Traceback is an easy Linux box that appears to have already been compromised. After scanning the site, I found a webshell that I used to gain access as a low-privileged user. This user has sudo access to a program that executes .lua scripts, so I wrote a simple .lua script to gain access as another user. As this user, I discover that the motd file, which displays a message when a user logs in, is writable.

item.title: About
item.description: I guess I need to write something here.
